delete.title: Delete a domain
delete.description: Are you sure you want to remove this domain from the hosting?
delete.autoconfigureDesc: A and AAAA records pointing to this hosting will be removed from the DNS zone.
delete.autoconfigureUnavailable: Not available: the DNS zone is not managed by OVHcloud.
delete.gitWarning: This domain has a Git association. It will also be deleted.

cdnFlush.title: Flush CDN cache
cdnFlush.description: Choose the type of purge to perform for the domain.
cdnFlush.warning: Cache flush may take a few minutes to propagate.

diagnostic.title: DNS servers verification
diagnostic.editRecord: Modify the {{recordType}} record with IP address {{ip}} in the DNS zone of domain {{domain}}.
diagnostic.addRecord: Add a {{recordType}} record with IP address {{ip}} in the DNS zone of domain {{domain}}.
diagnostic.otherNic: The modification must be made by the DNS zone administrator: {{nic}}
diagnostic.externalZone: The DNS zone for this domain is not managed by OVHcloud. Please make the modification with your DNS provider.

ssl.confirmRegenerate: Do you want to regenerate the SSL certificate?
